name: Advance (optional, no benefits, maxout bonus) - Exploration
Advance (optional, no benefits, maxout bonus) - Science
Advance (optional, no benefits, maxout bonus) - Military
Advance (optional, no benefits, maxout bonus) - Technology
Research - all move, you gain benefits (AGE OF DISCOVERY)
Explore (drawn territory only) and neighbours draw (COAL BARON)
Gain VP for Territory Tile terrain (COLONIALISM)
Discard Tapestry to Gain 2 VP each (DEMOCRACY)
Advance anywhere, advance opponents - no benefit (OIL MAGNATE)
Repeat bonuses but no benefits (MARRIAGE OF STATE)
First to era: invent and upgrade tech, else VP (TECHNOCRACY)
Copy opponent benefit, they get free bonus (TRADE ECONOMY)
Invent - from top of the deck

id: #tt - type of table, ct - type of card (card_type), dest - where to pay it

name: Gain income building and place outside of the city bounds
Place a token to gain VP
Gain the benefit of a neighbor’s current position on any advancement track (no bonus)
Gain the benefit of a territory or space tile in a neighbor’s supply
Gain the benefit of a neighbor’s tech card, matching its current row
Gain the benefits of a WHEN PLAYED tapestry card on a neighbor’s income mat
Request to see the chosen neighbor’s hand of tapestry cards
Choose 1 of your advancement tokens. Gain resources equal to the cost of advancing into its current position
Advance on any track to match the closest opponent who is ahead of you on that track. You may gain the benefit but not the bonus.
Regress exactly 3 spaces on an advancement track where this is possible. You may gain the benefit and pay to gain the bonus (if any)
Advance to the next bonus on any track and gain that bonus for free. Do not gain the benefit or any landmarks you pass
Opponents gain tech card from the deck
Roll the black conquer die twice and gain one benefit of your choice
Roll the research die twice and gain one benefit of your choice
Roll the conquer dice and gain both benefits
Roll the red conquer die twice and gain both benefits
Gamblers: Draw 3 Tapestry, Play 1 (WHEN PLAYED), if cannot, Keep 1
URBAN PLANNERS Bonus if 2+ Landmarks replaced
RELENTLESS Spent cubes now to collect benefit
